title: INSANE Amazon Category Change [NEW Rocket Feature]

tactics.name: Avoid Duplicate Categories
tactics.description: Select categories that are not duplicates to maximize visibility and bestseller eligibility.
steps: Prioritize unique categories for better ranking
caveats: Duplicates may still benefit high-performing books in subcategories
source_quotes: 54 of them are actually duplicates of others

tactics.name: Avoid Ghost Categories
tactics.description: Exclude categories that cannot generate bestseller tags or visible category pages.
steps: Check if categories link to actual pages
Avoid categories labeled as 'best sellers' without names
caveats: Ghost categories may still appear in parent categories
source_quotes: 27% of categories listed on KDP are ghost categories

tactics.name: category_keyword_optimization
tactics.description: Use category-specific keywords to strengthen book arguments and expand category eligibility
steps: Click on a category to view discovered keywords
Use 1-2 keyword boxes for category keywords
caveats: Ghost categories may have misleading names
source_quotes: click on a category here and see what keywords we have found strengthen your argument

heuristics.name: Penalize Ghost Categories
heuristics.condition: If a category lacks a visible name or links to a browser node, penalize its selection.
source_quotes: Ghost categories don't have a name nor can you see the category Tree

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
source_quotes: I now recommend that authors use one or two of their seven Kindle keyword boxes

claims.statement: Amazon allows up to three category selections per book.
source_quotes: you can select three and that's it

claims.statement: Amazon may override selected categories based on keyword analysis.
source_quotes: we reserve the right to change the categories of a book

claims.statement: Amazon has ghost categories with misleading names
source_quotes: some of these categories even have names that say something like name later

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with niche constraints.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Low review counts and constrained categories improve visibility in subcategories.
source_quotes: if your book is listed in it you can't rank for it
